definition: direction/strike (i.e. angle of inclination in geology)/inclination/trend/to move towards/to head for
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
strike-slip fault (geology)/fault line where the two sides slide horizontally past one another
pinyin: zou3 xiang4 hua2 dong4 duan4 ceng2

sentences.english: It is a shortcut to accomplishment and an easy escape from embarrassment.
sentences.chinese: 它是走向成功的捷徑，也是擺脫困境的妙方。

sentences.english: Billions years ago, human had moved from ocean to land and dominated the earth;
sentences.chinese: 億萬年後人從陸地走向森林，選擇水岸。

sentences.english: My reasons to go upcountry are varied.
sentences.chinese: 我走向內地的原因有很多。

sentences.english: They are currently in the process of piloting two programs aimed at getting families outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 他們最近還在實施另兩個旨在讓家庭走向戶外的項目。

sentences.english: According to Polson, bands' music changes when they go mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 波爾森表示，樂隊在走向主流後，音樂發生了變化。

sentences.english: How ungrateful then that, as the talks limp towards collapse, accusing fingers are being pointed at America.
sentences.chinese: 隨着對話走向破裂，大家非常不領情面得指責美國。

sentences.english: The women my mother denigrated were the ones urging me towards independence.
sentences.chinese: 我母親所詆譭的女士們都敦促我走向獨立。

sentences.english: Dubai sorely lacked such oversight in the run-up to the crash.
sentences.chinese: 在走向破產的道路上，迪拜非常缺乏這樣的監管。

sentences.english: We're all goin' the same way, just taking different roads to get there…
sentences.chinese: 我們都走向統一個方向，只是走的路不同罷了。

sentences.english: Low-alcohol Lujiu (liquors produced in Shandong) is the first to enter national market in quantities.
sentences.chinese: 低度魯酒率先大批量地走向全國市場。

sentences.english: The conclusion part explained the status and the trend of the Mulao Minority's Yifan festival.
sentences.chinese: 結語部分說明依飯節在仫佬族文化中的地位及走向。

sentences.english: The generator shall be in the horizontal position with the tube oriented horizontally.
sentences.chinese: 臥置的發電機上連接的那根管子的走向應呈水平方向。

sentences.english: It was a sight to watch my hairless Sindu walking towards her classroom.
sentences.chinese: 看着我的光頭欣頓走向教室，那真是一大景色。

sentences.english: "Rick, " said Claudia softly, walking in his direction.
sentences.chinese: “瑞克，”克勞迪亞柔聲說着，走向他。

sentences.english: Jack gets up and advances toward Victor.
sentences.chinese: 傑克站了起來，向前走向維克多。

sentences.english: I hope some of those concepts come to market in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 我希望2010年這些理念能走向市場。

definition: to stride toward (success)/to march toward/to take a step toward
to leave (a room etc)/to go out through (a door etc)
to step in/to stride forward/to forge ahead
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)
to change direction/fig. to change one's stance
to get lost/to lose one's way
